BIOS Files:
BIOS will be searched through 3 folders:
∙`Emulation/roms/arcade/`
∙`Emulation/bios/mame/`
∙`Emulation/bios/`
∙ES-DE will ONLY work with the BIOS in `Emulation/roms/arcade/` folder

BIOS will be searched through 3 folders:
∙`Emulation/roms/arcade/`
∙`Emulation/bios/mame/`
∙`Emulation/bios/`
∙ES-DE ONLY work with the BIOS in `Emulation/roms/arcade/` folder

Create `same_cdi/bios` folders in `Emulation/bios`
Place `cdibios.zip` in `Emulation/bios/same_cdi/bios`
May substitute `cdibios.zip` with `cdimono.zip` or `cdimono2.zip`

Place `cdimono1.zip` in `Emulation/roms/cdimono` or `Emulation/bios`
ES-DE will only work with the BIOS in `Emulation/roms/cdimono`

Place `gamecom.zip` in `Emulation/roms/gamecom` or `Emulation/bios`
ES-DE will only work with the BIOS in `Emulation/roms/gamecom`

Place `vsmile.zip` in `Emulation/roms/vsmile` or `Emulation/bios`
ES-DE will only work with the BIOS in `Emulation/roms/vsmile`
